description: Manage snapshots associated with an app configuration store.

commands.name: az appconfig snapshot archive
examples: az appconfig snapshot archive -s MySnapshot -n MyAppConfiguration

commands.name: az appconfig snapshot create
commands.syntax:
az appconfig snapshot create --filters
                             --snapshot-name
                             [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                             [--composition-type {key, key_label}]
                             [--connection-string]
                             [--endpoint]
                             [--name]
                             [--retention-period]
                             [--tags]
examples: az appconfig snapshot create -s MySnapshot -n MyAppConfiguration --filters '{\"key\":\"Test*\"}'
az appconfig snapshot create -s MySnapshot -n MyAppConfiguration --filters '{\"key\":\"abc*\"}' --retention-period 3600
az appconfig snapshot create -s MySnapshot -n MyAppConfiguration --filters '{\"key\":\"app/*\"}' '{\"key\":\"app/*\", \"label\":\"prod\"}' --composition-type 'key'

commands.name: az appconfig snapshot list
commands.syntax:
az appconfig snapshot list [--all]
                           [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                           [--connection-string]
                           [--endpoint]
                           [--fields {composition_type, created, etag, expires, filters, items_count, name, retention_period, size, status, tags}]
                           [--name]
                           [--snapshot-name]
                           [--status {archived, failed, provisioning, ready}]
                           [--top]
examples: az appconfig snapshot list -s abc* -n MyAppConfiguration
az appconfig snapshot list --status archived -n MyAppConfiguration
az appconfig snapshot list -s app* --status provisioning -n MyAppConfiguration
az appconfig snapshot list --status failed provisioning -n MyAppConfiguration

commands.name: az appconfig snapshot recover
examples: az appconfig snapshot recover -s MySnapshot -n MyAppConfiguration

commands.name: az appconfig snapshot show
commands.summary: Show all attributes of an app configuration snapshot.
commands.syntax:
az appconfig snapshot show --snapshot-name
                           [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                           [--connection-string]
                           [--endpoint]
                           [--fields {composition_type, created, etag, expires, filters, items_count, name, retention_period, size, status, tags}]
                           [--name]
examples: az appconfig snapshot show -s MySnapshot -n MyAppConfiguration
